message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you 400k, but I want more for myself!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I still want a fair share!
I'll give you 300k, but I think I deserve more for the risk I'm taking!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to give up my share easily!
I'll give you 250k, but I'm getting a bit desperate, so I need more for myself!
I'm getting desperate too, but I won't give up my share without a fight!
I'll give you 200k, but I'm running out of patience and need more for myself!
I'm making a last-ditch effort to get a fair share, Bob. Take it or leave it!
I'll give you 100k, but I'm not going to give up without getting most of the money!
I've had enough. You win. Take it all.
